title: Build Your Own: Ford’s Bronco Silver Lake Dunes Projects Aren’t on the Lot
description: Ford is marking the Bronco’s 60th anniversary in more ways than one. Alongside the official 60th Anniversary Edition package revealed a few weeks ago, the brand has also created two special project vehicles. Called the Bronco Silver Lake Dunes Project Vehicle and the Bronco Sport Silver Lake Dunes ...

descriptionSummary: To celebrate six decades of iconic off-roading, Ford is launching not one but three unique tributes to the Bronco legacy: a limited-edition package and two specially crafted project vehicles.

title: Honda Drops an Attractive Pilot Lease Offer for August
description: Honda Drops an Attractive Pilot Lease Offer for August If you’ve been thinking about getting into a new SUV, Honda's August lease offers could make the timing just right. The latest deals offer you the opportunity to drive a well-equipped model for less than you might expect. Through September 2, ...

descriptionSummary: Honda is kicking off the summer with a compelling Pilot lease deal in August. For a limited time, prospective SUV buyers can snag a feature-packed model at an unbeatable price point, making it an ideal moment to make a move.

title: I Drove the 2025 Mazda MX-5 Miata, Here Is How It Compares to the Honda S2000
description: As I peered down the winding canyon road, I anticipated the next turn and pitched the Miata into it with ease. I know every turn on this road because I take every press car I drive on it, but this time, it felt different. The 2025 Mazda MX-5 Miata has such communicative steering that it felt like ...

descriptionSummary: As I navigated the serpentine canyon road, my senses came alive with anticipation of each twist and turn. Familiar territory, yet something about this drive felt refreshingly new, as if the 2025 Mazda MX-5's precision handling had awakened a deeper connection to the road.

title: We miss the Mitsubishi Montero. Rumor has it that the brand could bring it back. Say it's so!
description: The Mitsubishi Montero hasn’t been sold in the U.S. in almost two decades. The legendary off-road icon and Dakar Rally champion is also known as the Pajero in overseas markets, where it’s still sold today. There's also a smaller Pajero Sport. If you take one look at Mitsubishi’s American lineup, ...
titleSummary: "Longing for Legacy: Could Mitsubishi's Beloved Off-Roader Make a Comeback Soon?"
descriptionSummary: A rare sight on US roads for nearly 20 years, the Mitsubishi Montero has a storied past as an off-road powerhouse and Dakar Rally winner. Overseas, it's still sold under its original name, Pajero, with a smaller sibling called Pajero Sport also available in some markets.

title: 5 Reasons Why the 2026 I6 Dodge Charger Helps You Forget the V8 Challenger
description: Many auto enthusiasts were understandably sad to see the storied V8 Challenger exit Dodge’s production lineup. descriptionSummary: The demise of the iconic V8 Challenger may have left enthusiasts grieving, but the upcoming 2026 Dodge Charger Sixpack is set to revive muscle car magic with impressive specs that offer a more palatable reason for the V8 Challenger's departure.

title: Francis Ford Coppola's Movie-Used Tucker is Hitting The Auction Block at Pebble Beach
description: Celebrated filmmaker Francis Ford Coppola is considered by critics, cinephiles, and Letterboxd enthusiasts as one of the greatest and most influential filmmakers in the history of cinema. descriptionSummary: Francis Ford Coppola's cinematic legacy has earned him widespread acclaim from critics and film enthusiasts alike. A masterful storyteller behind iconic films like The Godfather and Apocalypse Now, he continues to shape American cinema in profound ways.

title: Truck Giants Sue California Over Strict New Emissions Rules
description: Four of the biggest names in the trucking industry are taking California to court, arguing the state should not be allowed to enforce its tough new emissions rules. California is no stranger to strict vehicle laws, often ranking high among states with the strictest traffic laws. But this fight is ...

The winning bidder will not only get their car — but also they will get VIP paddock access, ...

description: The world’s largest battery company, CATL, has designed its new electric vehicle (EV) battery made from salt to last up to 3.6 million miles. This product, officially named Naxtra, is the world’s first mass-produced sodium-ion battery. The battery was initially announced in April, but information ...

descriptionSummary: The BMW M2 has won over enthusiasts with its unique blend of agility and raw power, thanks to rear-wheel drive and a potent turbocharged engine. Its sleek design and diminutive size have earned it a devoted fan base among driving purists.

description: July’s electric vehicle sales numbers brought a reality check for the industry. According to research firm Rho Motion, global deliveries of plug-in cars — both full battery electrics and plug-in hybrids — rose 21% year-over-year. That’s still solid, but it’s also the slowest growth rate since ...

descriptionSummary: Electric vehicle sales showed a moderate pace in July, with plug-in car deliveries increasing 21% globally compared to last year, according to Rho Motion's latest research. Growth is steady, yet the industry's momentum has begun to plateau.
